input.sentences: i went up to the farm on my motorcycle .
the family dog was there playing with toys .
i met up with my father | who encouraged me to explore the rest of the farm .
i took my son with me .
we saw two sheep and my son enjoyed them .
output.sentences: The biker rode up to the farm, wondering what he would see.
A dog came out to greet him with the hopes of playing fetch.
An older man grimaced as he thought about the kind of trouble that would come with this biker.
A little boy prepared to fling some manure at the trespasser.
The sheep looked on in anticipation, waiting to see what would happen next.
